Name: Contracts, Not-for-Profit, Review
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City Charter in relation to the review of patterns of contractual spending by the city agencies with not-for-profit organizations.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section 1.  Section 30 of the New York City Charter is amended by adding a new subdivision 3 to read as follows and renumbering 3, 4, 5 and 6 respectfully:
      3. patterns of contractual spending by city agencies with not-for-profit organizations and patterns of spending by not-for-profit organizations that receive city funding comprising one hundred thousand dollars or more of the budget of such organization; 
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall become effective immediately.
